what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Tardive Dyskinesia ?,"The NINDS conducts and supports a broad range of research on movement disorders including tardive dyskinesia. The goals of this research are to improve understanding of these disorders and to discover ways to treat, prevent, and, ultimately, cure them.",NINDS,Tardive Dyski
